overview: My Roommate's a Perv: Curly-haired hunk Luke Roman loves to sneak into Jasmine Jai's room to sniff her panties without her knowing. This time he's almost caught, barely managing to hide in her closet as she comes home with her boyfriend Skylar Dee. Luke spies on his roommate and her tall, long-haired boyfriend as they kiss on the bed and soon he's too tempted to resist.
title: Bisexual Roommates
